pros: Friendly environment, good pay, caring individuals

job_title: Certified Medical Assistant in Harlingen, TX
pros: Accumulate PTO and Vacation, great coworkers, loved working with the midwives!
cons: Not enough pay, management is not that great, sometimes drama in the office.

review_title: Don't walk. Run! Run away from this place.
pros: It's a paycheck.  Nothing more than that.
cons: Secretive, deceitful upper management.  Severe lack of communication.  Extreme favoritism is rampant.  Zero opportunity for personal growth or advancement.   Raises are across-the-board meaning everybody gets one or nobody does and while I was there there were no raises in 5 years.
